page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content: FOR THE VAST MAJORITY OF THE TIME THERE ARE NO INCIDENTS LOCALLY THAT REQUIRE THE SERVICES OF OUR LOCAL POLICE FORCE.SHOULD THERE BE A PROBLEM THE POLICE WILL COME QUICKLY.POLICEMEN TAKE FINGERPRINTS,ASK FOR A DESCRIPTION OF ANY STOLEN ITEMS,AND HUNT FOR CLUES.THE POLICE ALSO CONTROL THE BUSY ROADS IN OUR AREA ENSURING THAT PEDESTRIANS AND MOTORISTS ARE SAFE.THEY ALSO CONTROL LARGE CROWDS,MEETINGS,OR MARCHES.IF ARRESTED THE DEFENDANT WILL APPEAR IN FRONT OF A MAGISTRATE,MORE SERIOUS CRIMES WILL BE DEALT WITH BY A JUDGE AND JURY.ALL DEFENDANTS HAVE A RIGHT TO A DEFENCE LAWYER.IN THIS DISTRICT THERE IS THE { {HEWELL GRANGE REMAND CENTRE,}ALSO { {BROCKHILL}DETENTION CENTRE FOR YOUNG OFFENDERS.(these are both located on the same site)
